QuestData.Title: The Perfect Stout
QuestData.Description: I'm on a quest to make the perfect stout. I know I can do it -- brewing's in my blood. I just need to find the right recipe...$B$BThe Frostmane trolls grow a plant, shimmerweed, up on Shimmer Ridge to the northwest. They use it in their strange, tribal rituals. We haven't found much use for it, but it has a unique taste... and I want to experiment with it in my brews!$B$BObtaining the shimmerweed will be dangerous, but I'll pay well for any you can "borrow" from the baskets in the troll village.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 7 Shimmerweeds to Rejold Barleybrew in Kharanos.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have that shimmerweed? I almost have a batch of stout ready to brew, and I want to try throwing the weed in with this mixture.
QuestData.RewardText: Great! I can't wait to use these in some of my recipes. There's one in particular I think it'll work great in...
